DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 2a , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel group , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety , tolerability , efficacy pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic effect ABT-981 patient symptomatic , radiographic , inflammatory knee osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2a Study Evaluating Safety , Efficacy , Pharmacodynamic Effects ABT-981 Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
